entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Haliburton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:54 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: -1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -8.3°C
Wind: SW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
